"A.D.2028/4/23/13:00": "This is another crazy place... Instead of being on the surface, they've built it underground. "
"There's no issues with gravity or oxygen either... I was kind of looking forward to that 1/6th gravity."
"This may be similar technology to what ARKS use when fighting in outer space."
"If you think that Photons and Ether are almost the exact same thing, it's not surprising what they could do with it."
"But putting that aside... <%me>, does this seem familiar to you?"
"It looks very similar to the inside of the old mothership... to where Xion was."
"Since Mother is a clone of Xion, maybe she's trying to recreate the Mothership inside the moon?"
"But since the technical skills are lacking... maybe she's trying to embody it instead?"
"In other words, this place... She's trying to make the moon into a mothership?"
"Hoho. The embodiment of a mothership? You may be onto something, young lady."
"But the air here... How should I put it? It feels more like the ARKS world than it does Earth."
"It's almost as if this is becoming less and less like Earth."
"Hoho. The embodiment of a mothership? You may be onto something, young lady."
"Aratron..."
"I see you've changed sides, Kohri Washinomiya."
"I'm sorry... I can't... walk alongside Mother anymore."
"Hoho. It's alright. Your eyes are far more lively than when you were with us."
"That place with them is where you belonged, that's all there is to it."
"...Will you withdraw?"
"Not by the hair on this head of mine, however vacated it may seem. Hoho."
"No matter what?"
"...You're becoming repetitive, young lady. I've already decided to walk alongside Mother."
"These old bones are stubborn, they can't bend at all anymore. So no matter what you say now, I won't bend either. And so!"
"To those who are too far, listen to the sound! To those who are close, see with your eyes!"
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of Earth! Aratron Tolstoy! I shall be your opponent!"
"Long Long Lone"
"母なる願い"
